t: How to pair a Firestick remote to your Amazon Fire TV, and add or replace remotes
s: November 4, 2022 - You can add a new remote or place an old one in Amazon Fire TV's settings. Some non-Firestick remotes can be paired but they must use specific Bluetooth profiles to work. If you have an Amazon Fire TV, the Firestick remote can be a useful tool. But before you can start using it, you have to pair the remote to your TV. The process will vary slightly depending on whether you have existing remotes paired, as well as if you're using an off-brand ...
